short_summary: Elder Services at Springhill Institution in Nova Scotia
description: Tender notification for the requirements. The contract type is advance contract award notice and will be for 3 years.
full_summary:
Elder Services
================

Notice Type
------------

This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN), which means that the contractor has already been selected for the contract. The tender closing date has expired, and the contract award decision has been made.

Contract Details
-----------------

### Contract Title

Elder Services at Springhill Institution in Nova Scotia

### Tender Reference Number

cb-669-70399937

### Tender Amendment Number

5

### Solicitation Number

21206-24-4545467

### Tender Closing Date

October 28, 2023 ( Closed)

### Expected Contract Start Date

November 20, 2023

### Expected Contract End Date

March 31, 2026

### Contracting Entity

Correctional Service Canada

Address: 1045 Main Street
Moncton, NB E1C1H1

### Contact Information

Claudia Landry, Contact Person
Phone: (506) 378-8722
Fax: (506) 851-6327
Email: [claudia.landry@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:claudia.landry@csc-scc.gc.ca)

Contract Description
-------------------

This contract is for Elder Services at Springhill Institution in Nova Scotia. The services are expected to be delivered in Nova Scotia, and the contract period will span from November 20, 2023, to March 31, 2026.
